CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL( TotalGrossCostNmb__c ), IMAGE("/img/samples/rating3.gif", "Em Processamento", 16, 16), IF(BottleneckDaysNmb__c = 0 || BottleneckDaysNmb__c = NULL, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "OK", 16,16), IF(BottleneckDaysNmb__c < 20, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "Gargalo - at√© 20 dias", 16,16), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Gargalo - acima de 20 dias", 16,16))))
CustomField.label: Flag Gargalo
